attributes.action: Make payments and benefits payable immediately and not in the future.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many pensioners who in their lifetime have worked hard will never receive the benefits due to them. MPs.and Gvt.Ministers receive immediate increases in pay and perks, but the aged have to live in hope that they may have their delayed increases in time to enjoy them.
All increases in payments should be based on a percentage of the National Average Wage, this to include without exception even the Prime Minister's emolument
